title: Bug 4937Display view contents not restored properly
description: Bug 4937Display view contents not restored properly
OB: Exit a workspace with a display view present that has content with formatting.When the workspace starts up and the display is viewed, the restored contentwill have lost the formatting.
SR: Exit a workspace with a display view present that has content with formatting.When the workspace starts up and the display is viewed, the restored contentwill have lost the formatting.
